header.title: Hi, I'm Gopal
header.description: Experienced Flutter Developer and Team Lead with a passion for crafting high-quality mobile apps. Skilled in code review, task management, and clean architecture. Committed to fostering a collaborative learning environment. Author on Medium, sharing insights on mobile app development.

aboutMe.title: Interested in learning more about me?
aboutMe.description:
üöÄ Flutter Developer & Team Lead üì±
With 2+ years in mobile app development, I've evolved into a Mobile Developer and Team Lead. I'm passionate about clean code and effective team collaboration, striving for top-tier mobile apps. Beyond coding, I'm an educator, dedicated to sharing knowledge and inspiring others. Let's connect to innovate in the mobile app world!

‚úçÔ∏è Tech Enthusiast & Educator üìö
In addition to app development, I'm an enthusiastic writer and educator. My recent Medium articles delve into boosting productivity with Flutter modularization. I'm deeply committed to creating a supportive learning environment and have guest taught, igniting students' coding passion. Connect with me for tech innovation and collaborative learning!

By the way, I'm available for freelance projects, so please feel free to get in touch and introduce yourself! I assure you, I'm approachable and friendly üòâ

skills.text: The skills, tools and technologies I am really good at:

experiences.text: Here's a concise overview of my most recent experiences:

items.title: Flutter Developer
items.description: Dedicated Flutter Developer with a proven record of driving excellence in mobile app development. Proficient in task management, code optimization, and fostering a collaborative team environment. Skilled mentor and code reviewer, committed to delivering high-quality software solutions.

items.title: Software Developer Trainee
items.description: Skilled Software Developer Trainee with a strong background in automating release and testing processes, optimizing codebase through clean architecture, and delivering top-notch web applications.

items.title: System Administrator
items.description: System settings & different OS configurations. Maintain & Support different Notebook & Desktop Systems, User shares, file shares, etc. Install & configure different network printers. Configuration and monitoring of Wi-Fi connection. Manage support of new technologies as adopted by the business. Different software deployment. Support to Corporate Antivirus applications.

items.title: System Administrator
items.description: System settings & different OS configurations. Maintain & Support different Notebook & Desktop Systems, User shares, file shares, etc. Install & configure different network printers. Configuration and monitoring of Wi-Fi connection. Manage support of new technologies as adopted by the business. Different software deployment. Support to Corporate Antivirus applications.

projects.text: Here are a few of the noteworthy projects I've developed:

items.name: Story Book App
items.description: Mo Gapa Bahi Aap : invites you into a captivating realm of storytelling that spans a myriad of genres and themes, transcending age barriers to cater to the diverse literary cravings of readers.

items.name: News Bell News App
items.description: NewsBell is your all-in-one news app designed to keep you informed and engaged with the latest news, and trending stories from around the world. Whether you're a news enthusiast, a casual reader, or simply someone who wants to stay updated, NewsBell has got you covered.

items.name: New Bharat Biz
items.description: New Bharat Biz is an online service Mobile APP that helps you find the right service professionals for activities of importance.Whether you are looking for professionals to decorate your home, grooming services like salon at home, make-up artist at home, plan your kid's birthday party, get healthier or any other utility services, New Bharat Biz is the ultimate destination.

contact.text: Looking forward to what's ahead! Whether you're seeking a developer, have questions, or just want to connect, please don't hesitate to reach out.
